Control Name: Plans and Prepares for Succession—Senior management and the board of directors develop contingency plans for assignments of responsibility important for internal control.

control_attributes.SubCategory: CC1.4 COSO Principle 4: The entity demonstrates a commitment to attract, develop, and retain competent individuals in alignment with objectives.
